title: How SA’s warning systems stalled during floods
desc: Impact-based warnings were meant to trigger evacuations and the positioning of emergency services, but in many remote villages the message did not translate into action.

title: Multimodel isotope simulations reveal unified picture of Earth’s water cycle
desc: An international research team, including scientists from Rice University, the University of Tokyo and NASA, has completed the first fully standardized comparison of isotope-enabled climate models.

title: UN forum calls for overhaul of agrifood systems
desc: Rising food prices and declining farm incomes are putting increasing pressure on the global food system, with up to 720 million people facing hunger last year, and billions more struggling to afford healthy diets.

title: 'Holy crap' - Ryan Reynolds & Hugh Jackman left stunned after Wrexham handed dream FA Cup draw against Chelsea
desc: Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman were left stunned by the FA Cup fifth round draw, as Wrexham were paired with Premier League giants Chelsea. The Welsh club have reached the fifth round for the first time since 1997 and are now preparing to take on one of the biggest clubs in England.
